meta.description: Optimize the number of servers delivering by cart and by hand to minimize refills while meeting customer interaction requirements.

params.name: interactions
params.description: Customer interactions per hour for each delivery method.

params.name: refills
params.description: Number of refills per hour for each delivery method.

params.name: total_interactions_required
params.description: Total customer interactions required per hour.

params.name: min_hand_servers
params.description: Minimum number of servers delivering by hand.

params.name: min_cart_percentage
params.description: Minimum percentage of delivery shifts that must be by cart.

vars.name: servers
vars.description: Number of servers assigned to each delivery method.

objective.name: min_total_refills
objective.description: Minimize the total number of refills per hour.

constraints.name: interaction_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure the total customer interactions per hour meet the requirement.

constraints.name: min_hand_servers
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of servers deliver by hand.

constraints.name: min_cart_percentage
constraints.description: Ensure at least 70% of delivery shifts are by cart.
